recitation_page.detect_tashkeel_desc: Tashkeel mistake detection is a new feature and may miss some of your tashkeel mistakes.
recitation_page.dont_progress_text: Don't progress until mistake is fixed
recitation_page.dont_progress_desc: Require every single word to be recited correctly before moving on to the next word.
recitation_page.resumable_sessions_desc: Control whether to resume the current session, or start a new session every time recording is started.

manage_download_page.clear_all_caches_desc: Are you sure you want to delete all downloaded audio for all reciters?
